project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Create a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a specified CSV file. The program will calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns selected by the user.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for numerical columns
Implement median calculation for numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for numerical columns
Create user interface for selecting columns and displaying results
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
